00297         wxMenuItem * ID_MNU_BUILD_1089_mnuItem_obj = new wxMenuItem (ID_MNU_FILE_1080_Mnu_Obj, ID_MNU_BUILD_1089, wxT("&Build"), wxT("Build the current package"), wxITEM_NORMAL);
00298         wxBitmap ID_MNU_BUILD_1089_mnuItem_obj_BMP(PackMaker2Frm_ID_MNU_BUILD_1089_XPM);
00299         ID_MNU_BUILD_1089_mnuItem_obj->SetBitmap(ID_MNU_BUILD_1089_mnuItem_obj_BMP);
00300         ID_MNU_FILE_1080_Mnu_Obj->Append(ID_MNU_BUILD_1089_mnuItem_obj);
00301         ID_MNU_FILE_1080_Mnu_Obj->AppendSeparator();
00302         wxMenuItem * ID_MNU_EXIT_1091_mnuItem_obj = new wxMenuItem (ID_MNU_FILE_1080_Mnu_Obj, ID_MNU_EXIT_1091, wxT("&Exit\tAlt+F4"), wxT("Quit this program"), wxITEM_NORMAL);
00303         wxBitmap ID_MNU_EXIT_1091_mnuItem_obj_BMP(PackMaker2Frm_ID_MNU_EXIT_1091_XPM);
00304         ID_MNU_EXIT_1091_mnuItem_obj->SetBitmap(ID_MNU_EXIT_1091_mnuItem_obj_BMP);
00305         ID_MNU_FILE_1080_Mnu_Obj->Append(ID_MNU_EXIT_1091_mnuItem_obj);
00306         WxMenuBar1->Append(ID_MNU_FILE_1080_Mnu_Obj, wxT("&File"));
00307         
00308         wxMenu *ID_MNU_HELP_1081_Mnu_Obj = new wxMenu(0);
00309         wxMenuItem * ID_MNU_ABOUT_1092_mnuItem_obj = new wxMenuItem (ID_MNU_HELP_1081_Mnu_Obj, ID_MNU_ABOUT_1092, wxT("&About\tF1"), wxT("About this program"), wxITEM_NORMAL);
00310         wxBitmap ID_MNU_ABOUT_1092_mnuItem_obj_BMP(PackMaker2Frm_ID_MNU_ABOUT_1092_XPM);
00311         ID_MNU_ABOUT_1092_mnuItem_obj->SetBitmap(ID_MNU_ABOUT_1092_mnuItem_obj_BMP);
00312         ID_MNU_HELP_1081_Mnu_Obj->Append(ID_MNU_ABOUT_1092_mnuItem_obj);
00313         WxMenuBar1->Append(ID_MNU_HELP_1081_Mnu_Obj, wxT("&Help"));
00314         SetMenuBar(WxMenuBar1);
00315 
00316         WxStatusBar1 = new wxStatusBar(this, ID_WXSTATUSBAR1);
00317 
00318         SetStatusBar(WxStatusBar1);
00319         WxToolBar1->SetToolBitmapSize(wxSize(16,16));
00320         WxToolBar1->Realize();
00321         SetToolBar(WxToolBar1);
00322         SetTitle(wxT("PackMaker2"));
00323         SetIcon(wxNullIcon);
00324         SetSize(8,8,456,415);
00325         Center();
00326         
00328 }

00376 void PackMaker2Frm::Clear()
00377 {
00378     FileName = wxT("");
00379     if(IniFile)
00380     {
00381         delete IniFile;
00382         IniFile = NULL;
00383     }
00384     edName->SetValue(wxT(""));
00385     edNameVersion->SetValue(wxT(""));
00386     edVersion->SetValue(wxT(""));
00387     edStartMenu->SetValue(wxT(""));
00388 
00389     edDescription->SetValue(wxT(""));
00390     edURL->SetValue(wxT(""));
00391     edReadMe->SetValue(wxT(""));
00392     edLicense->SetValue(wxT(""));
00393     edPicture->SetValue(wxT(""));
00394     edDepend->SetValue(wxT(""));
00395     chbReboot->SetValue(false);
00396 
00397     IconView->DeleteAllItems();
00398     FileView->DeleteAllItems();
00399 }

00410 
00411 bool PackMaker2Frm::CreateNewFile()
00412 {
00413     bool Result = false;
00414     while(SaveDialog->ShowModal() != wxID_OK)
00415     {
00416       if(wxMessageBox(
00417         wxT("You must create the file before starting because filenames you\nwill use later will be relative to that file."),
00418         wxT("Error"),wxCANCEL|wxOK|wxICON_EXCLAMATION) == wxID_CANCEL)
00419           return Result;
00420     }
00421     if(IniFile)
00422     {
00423         delete IniFile;
00424         IniFile = NULL;
00425     }
00426     FileName = SaveDialog->GetPath();
00427     if(wxFileExists(FileName))
00428     {
00429         IniFile = new wxFileConfig(wxEmptyString, wxEmptyString,FileName,wxEmptyString,wxCONFIG_USE_LOCAL_FILE | wxCONFIG_USE_NO_ESCAPE_CHARACTERS);
00430         ReadDevPackFile();
00431     }
00432     else
00433         IniFile = new wxFileConfig(wxEmptyString, wxEmptyString,FileName,wxEmptyString,wxCONFIG_USE_LOCAL_FILE | wxCONFIG_USE_NO_ESCAPE_CHARACTERS);
00434         
00435     Result = true;
00436     return Result;
00437 }
00438 
00439 void PackMaker2Frm::SaveItemClick()
00440 {
00441     if(FileName.IsEmpty())
00442         SaveAsItemClick();
00443     else
00444         WriteDevPackFile();
00445 }

00447 void PackMaker2Frm::SaveAsItemClick()
00448 {
00449     if(SaveDialog->ShowModal())
00450     {
00451         FileName = SaveDialog->GetPath();
00452         if(IniFile)
00453         {
00454             delete IniFile;
00455             IniFile = NULL;
00456         }
00457         IniFile = new wxFileConfig(wxEmptyString, wxEmptyString,FileName,wxEmptyString,wxCONFIG_USE_LOCAL_FILE | wxCONFIG_USE_NO_ESCAPE_CHARACTERS);
00458         SaveItemClick();
00459     }
00460 }

00549 
00550 void PackMaker2Frm::BuildPackage()
00551 {
00552     wxFileName TempFileName(FileName);
00553     const int BufferSize = 1024*32;
00554     
00555     //Make TAR
00556     TempFileName.SetExt(wxT("tar"));
00557     wxFileOutputStream out(TempFileName.GetFullPath());
00558     wxTarOutputStream TarStream(out);
00559         
00560     if(buildForm)
00561     {
00562         buildForm->WxStaticBox1->SetLabel(wxT(" Building tar archive... "));
00563         buildForm->WxGauge1->SetRange((FileView->GetItemCount()+1) *2);
00564         buildForm->WxGauge1->SetValue(1);
00565     } 
00566     
00567     TempFileName.SetExt(wxT("DevPackage"));
00568     //Add the file name to tar.PutNextEntry
00569     TarStream.PutNextEntry(TempFileName.GetFullName());
00570     //Added to test
00571     wxStringInputStream TempInputStringStream(WriteDevPackFileToString());
00572     TarStream.Write(TempInputStringStream);
00573     //Send data into tar
00574         
00575     wxString TempCWD = wxGetCwd();
00576     {
00577         wxFileName TempFileName(FileName);
00578         wxSetWorkingDirectory(TempFileName.GetPath());
00579     }
00580         
00581     wxListItem Column1;
00582     Column1.SetColumn(1);
00583     Column1.SetMask(wxLIST_MASK_TEXT);
00584     wxListItem Column2;
00585     Column2.SetColumn(2);
00586     Column2.SetMask(wxLIST_MASK_TEXT);
00587 
00588     for(int i = 0; i < FileView->GetItemCount();i++)
00589     {
00590         Column1.SetId(i);
00591         FileView->GetItem(Column1);
00592         Column2.SetId(i);
00593         FileView->GetItem(Column2);
00594         if(Column2.GetText().CmpNoCase(wxT("Y")) == 0)
00595         {
00596             wxArrayString sl;
00597             wxDir::GetAllFiles(FileView->GetItemText(i),&sl);
00598             TarStream.PutNextDirEntry(FileView->GetItemText(i));
00599             wxString CurrentDir = FileView->GetItemText(i);
00600             for(size_t j = 0; j < sl.GetCount();j++)
00601             {
00602                 if(wxDir::Exists(sl[j]))
00603                 {
00604                     //Add the file name to tar.PutNextDirEntry
00605                     TarStream.PutNextDirEntry(sl[j]);
00606                 }
00607                 else
00608                 {
00609                     wxFileName CurrentFileName(sl[j]);
00610                         
00611                     wxFileInputStream InputFile(CurrentFileName.GetFullPath());
00612                     if(InputFile.IsOk())
00613                     {
00614                         //Add the file name to tar.PutNextEntry
00615                         TarStream.PutNextEntry(CurrentFileName.GetFullPath());
00616                         //Send data into tar
00617                         TarStream.Write(InputFile);
00618                     }
00619                 }
00620             }
00621         }
00622         else
00623         {
00624             wxFileName CurrentFileName(FileView->GetItemText(i));
00625 
00626             wxFileInputStream InputFile(CurrentFileName.GetFullPath());
00627             if(InputFile.IsOk())
00628             {
00629                 //Add the file name to zip.PutNextEntry
00630                 TarStream.PutNextEntry(CurrentFileName.GetFullName());
00631                 //Send data into zip;
00632                 TarStream.Write(InputFile);
00633             }
00634         }
00635         if(buildForm)
00636         {
00637             buildForm->WxGauge1->SetValue(buildForm->WxGauge1->GetValue() + 1);
00638         }
00639     }
00640       
00641     if(!edReadMe->GetValue().IsEmpty())
00642     {
00643         wxFileName TempFileName(FileName);
00644         wxFileName TempSourceName(edReadMe->GetValue());
00645         TempSourceName.MakeAbsolute(TempFileName.GetPath());
00646         if(wxFileExists(TempSourceName.GetFullPath()))
00647         {
00648             wxFileInputStream InputFile(TempSourceName.GetFullPath());
00649             if(InputFile.IsOk())
00650             {
00651                 //Add the file name to zip.PutNextEntry
00652                 TarStream.PutNextEntry(TempSourceName.GetFullName());
00653                 //Send data into zip;
00654                 TarStream.Write(InputFile);
00655             }
00656         }
00657         else
00658         {
00659             if(buildForm)
00660             { 
00661                 if(wxMessageBox(wxT("Your readme file doesn't exist. Do you want to abort the creation of the package?"), wxT("File Error...") , wxICON_ERROR|wxYES|wxNO) == wxID_YES)
00662                 return;
00663             }
00664         }
00665     }
00666 
00667     if(!edLicense->GetValue().IsEmpty())
00668     {
00669         wxFileName TempFileName(FileName);
00670         wxFileName TempSourceName(edLicense->GetValue());
00671         TempSourceName.MakeAbsolute(TempFileName.GetPath());
00672         if(wxFileExists(TempSourceName.GetFullPath()))
00673         {
00674             wxFileInputStream InputFile(TempSourceName.GetFullPath());
00675             if(InputFile.IsOk())
00676             {
00677                 //Add the file name to zip.PutNextEntry
00678                 TarStream.PutNextEntry(TempSourceName.GetFullName());
00679                 //Send data into zip;
00680                 TarStream.Write(InputFile);
00681             }
00682         }
00683         else
00684         {
00685             if(buildForm)
00686             {
00687                  if(wxMessageBox(wxT("Your license file doesn't exist. Do you want to abort the creation of the package?"), wxT("File Error...") , wxICON_ERROR|wxYES|wxNO) == wxID_YES)
00688                  return;
00689             }
00690         }
00691     }
00692       
00693     TarStream.Close();
00694     if(!out.Close())
00695     {
00696         if(buildForm)
00697         {
00698             wxMessageBox(wxT("Error closing the tar stream"));
00699         }
00700     }
00701     
00702     // Make the Bzip2 file
00703     TempFileName.SetExt(wxT("DevPak"));
00704     wxFileOutputStream bzout(TempFileName.GetFullPath());
00705     wxBZipOutputStream bzfile(bzout,9);
00706         
00707     // Set the status in the UI
00708     if(buildForm)
00709     {
00710         buildForm->WxStaticBox1->SetLabel(wxT(" Building Bzip2 archive... "));
00711         buildForm->WxGauge1->SetValue(buildForm->WxGauge1->GetValue() + 4);
00712     }
00713   
00714     TempFileName.SetExt(wxT("tar"));
00715     {
00716         wxFileInputStream InputFile(TempFileName.GetFullPath());
00717         wxTarInputStream TempTarStream(InputFile);
00718         if(buildForm)
00719         {
00720             buildForm->WxGauge1->SetRange((InputFile.GetLength()/BufferSize)*2);
00721             buildForm->WxGauge1->SetValue((InputFile.GetLength()/BufferSize));
00722         }
00723         char Buffer[BufferSize];
00724         
00725         while(!InputFile.Eof())
00726         {
00727             InputFile.Read(Buffer,BufferSize);
00728             bzfile.Write(Buffer,InputFile.LastRead());
00729             if(buildForm)
00730             {
00731                 buildForm->WxGauge1->SetValue(buildForm->WxGauge1->GetValue()+1);
00732             }
00733         }
00734     }
00735     //Close bzfile file flushing remaining data
00736     bzfile.Close();
00737     bzout.Close();
00738     //Remove tar file
00739     if(!wxRemoveFile(TempFileName.GetFullPath()))
00740     {
00741         if(buildForm)
00742         {
00743             wxMessageBox(wxString(wxT("Couldn't remove temporary tar file named: ")) + TempFileName.GetFullPath());
00744         }
00745     }
00746     // Sucess message
00747     if(buildForm)
00748     {
00749         TempFileName.SetExt(wxT("DevPak"));
00750         wxMessageBox(wxString(wxT("Your Dev-C++ Package has been successfully created to ")) +
00751         TempFileName.GetFullPath() + wxT(". It is now ready for testing and distribution."), wxT("Success"),
00752         wxICON_INFORMATION|wxOK);
00753     }
00754 }
00755 
00756 void PackMaker2Frm::BuildItemClick()
00757 {
00758     if(!FileName.IsEmpty())
00759     {
00760         buildForm = new BuildForm(this);
00761     
00762         wxFileName TempFileName(FileName);
00763         TempFileName.SetExt(wxT("DevPak"));
00764         buildForm->Show();
00765         SaveItemClick();
00766         if(wxFileExists(TempFileName.GetFullPath()))
00767             wxRemoveFile(TempFileName.GetFullPath());
00768         BuildPackage();
00769     
00770         buildForm->Destroy();
00771         buildForm = NULL;
00772     }
00773     else
00774         wxMessageBox(wxT("You need to create a new item before trying to build"),wxT("Build Error"),wxOK|wxICON_WARNING);
00775 }
00776 
00777 void PackMaker2Frm::ReadDevPackFile()
00778 {
00779     bool TempBool = false;
00780 /*var files, icons : TStringList;
00781     i  : integer;
00782     fi : TFileItem;
00783     ic : TIconItem;
00784 begin*/
00785     if(IniFile)
00786     {
00787         IniFile->SetPath(SETUP_SECTION);
00788         edName->SetValue(IniFile->Read(wxT("AppName"), wxT("")));
00789         edNameVersion->SetValue(IniFile->Read(wxT("AppVerName"), wxT("")));
00790         edVersion->SetValue(IniFile->Read(wxT("AppVersion"), wxT("")));
00791         edStartMenu->SetValue(IniFile->Read(wxT("MenuName"), wxT("")));
00792 
00793         edDescription->SetValue(IniFile->Read(wxT("Description"), wxT("")));
00794         edURL->SetValue(IniFile->Read(wxT("Url"), wxT("")));
00795         edReadMe->SetValue(IniFile->Read(wxT("Readme"), wxT("")));
00796         edLicense->SetValue(IniFile->Read(wxT("License"), wxT("")));
00797         edPicture->SetValue(IniFile->Read(wxT("Picture"), wxT("")));
00798         edDepend->SetValue(IniFile->Read(wxT("Dependencies"), wxT("")));
00799         IniFile->Read(wxT("Reboot"), &TempBool, false);
00800         chbReboot->SetValue(TempBool);
00801 
00802         wxArrayString Files;
00803         wxString Str;
00804         long dummy;
00805         IniFile->SetPath(FILES_SECTION);
00806         bool bCont = IniFile->GetFirstEntry(Str, dummy);
00807         while ( bCont )
00808         {
00809             Files.Add(Str);
00810 
00811             bCont = IniFile->GetNextEntry(Str, dummy);
00812         }
00813         
00814         for(size_t i = 0; i < Files.GetCount(); i++)
00815         {
00816             int Index = FileView->GetItemCount();
00817             FileView->InsertItem(Index,Files[i]);
00818             FileView->SetItem(Index,1,IniFile->Read(Files[i],wxT("")));
00819             wxFileName TempFileName(FileName);
00820             wxFileName TempSourceName(Files[i]);
00821             TempSourceName.MakeAbsolute(TempFileName.GetPath());
00822             if(wxDirExists(TempSourceName.GetFullPath()))
00823                 FileView->SetItem(Index,2,wxT("Y"));
00824             else
00825                 FileView->SetItem(Index,2,wxT("N"));
00826         }
00827 
00828 
00829         IniFile->SetPath(ICONS_SECTION);
00830         Files.Clear();
00831         bCont = IniFile->GetFirstEntry(Str, dummy);
00832         while ( bCont )
00833         {
00834             Files.Add(Str);
00835 
00836             bCont = IniFile->GetNextEntry(Str, dummy);
00837         }
00838 
00839         for(size_t i = 0; i < Files.GetCount(); i++)
00840         {
00841             int Index = IconView->GetItemCount();
00842             IconView->InsertItem(Index,Files[i]);
00843             wxString TempString = IniFile->Read(Files[i],wxT(""));
00844             if(TempString.Find(wxT("<")) != wxNOT_FOUND)
00845             {
00846                 IconView->SetItem(Index,1,TempString.BeforeFirst(','));
00847                 IconView->SetItem(Index,2,TempString.AfterFirst(','));
00848             }
00849             else
00850             {
00851                 IconView->SetItem(Index,1,IniFile->Read(Files[i]));
00852                 IconView->SetItem(Index,2,wxT(""));
00853             }
00854         }
00855     }
00856 }
00857 
00858 void PackMaker2Frm::WriteDevPackFile()
00859 {
00860     if(IniFile)
00861     {
00862         IniFile->SetPath(SETUP_SECTION);
00863         IniFile->Write(wxT("Version"), DEVPAK_VERSION);
00864         IniFile->Write(wxT("AppName"), edName->GetValue());
00865         IniFile->Write(wxT("AppVerName"), edNameVersion->GetValue());
00866         IniFile->Write(wxT("AppVersion"), edVersion->GetValue());
00867         IniFile->Write(wxT("MenuName"), edStartMenu->GetValue());
00868 
00869         IniFile->Write(wxT("Description"), edDescription->GetValue());
00870         IniFile->Write(wxT("Url"), edURL->GetValue());
00871         IniFile->Write(wxT("Readme"), edReadMe->GetValue());
00872         IniFile->Write(wxT("License"), edLicense->GetValue());
00873         IniFile->Write(wxT("Picture"), edPicture->GetValue());
00874         IniFile->Write(wxT("Dependencies"), edDepend->GetValue());
00875         IniFile->Write(wxT("Reboot"), chbReboot->IsChecked());
00876 
00877         wxListItem Column1;
00878         Column1.SetColumn(1);
00879         Column1.SetMask(wxLIST_MASK_TEXT);
00880         wxListItem Column2;
00881         Column2.SetColumn(2);
00882         Column2.SetMask(wxLIST_MASK_TEXT);
00883         
00884         IniFile->SetPath(FILES_SECTION);
00885         
00886         for(int i = 0; i < FileView->GetItemCount(); i++)
00887         {
00888             Column1.SetId(i);
00889             FileView->GetItem(Column1);
00890             Column2.SetId(i);
00891             FileView->GetItem(Column2);
00892             if((Column2.GetText().CmpNoCase(wxT("Y")) == 0) && (Column1.GetText().Last() != wxFileName::GetPathSeparator()))
00893                 IniFile->Write(FileView->GetItemText(i), Column1.GetText() + wxFileName::GetPathSeparator());//May need to add a trailing backslash here
00894             else
00895                 IniFile->Write(FileView->GetItemText(i), Column1.GetText());
00896         }
00897 
00898         IniFile->SetPath(ICONS_SECTION);
00899         for(int i = 0; i < IconView->GetItemCount(); i++)
00900         {
00901             Column1.SetId(i);
00902             IconView->GetItem(Column1);
00903             Column2.SetId(i);
00904             IconView->GetItem(Column2);
00905             if(!Column2.GetText().IsEmpty())
00906                 IniFile->Write(IconView->GetItemText(i), wxString(Column1.GetText()) +
00907                     wxT(",") + Column2.GetText());
00908             else
00909                 IniFile->Write(IconView->GetItemText(i), Column1.GetText());
00910         }
00911         IniFile->Flush();
00912     }
00913 }
00914 
00915 wxString PackMaker2Frm::WriteDevPackFileToString()
00916 {
00917     wxString TempString;
00918     
00919     TempString << wxT("\n[Setup]\n");
00920     TempString << wxT("Version=") << DEVPAK_VERSION << wxT("\n");
00921     TempString << wxT("AppName=") << edName->GetValue() << wxT("\n");
00922     
00923     TempString << wxT("AppVerName=") << edNameVersion->GetValue() << wxT("\n");
00924     TempString << wxT("AppVersion=") << edVersion->GetValue() << wxT("\n");
00925     TempString << wxT("MenuName=") << edStartMenu->GetValue() << wxT("\n");
00926 
00927     TempString << wxT("Description=") << edDescription->GetValue() << wxT("\n");
00928     TempString << wxT("Url=") << edURL->GetValue() << wxT("\n");
00929     TempString << wxT("Readme=") << edReadMe->GetValue() << wxT("\n");
00930     TempString << wxT("License=") << edLicense->GetValue() << wxT("\n");
00931     TempString << wxT("Picture=") << edPicture->GetValue() << wxT("\n");
00932     TempString << wxT("Dependencies=") << edDepend->GetValue() << wxT("\n");
00933     TempString << wxT("Reboot=") << chbReboot->IsChecked() << wxT("\n");
00934 
00935     wxListItem Column1;
00936     Column1.SetColumn(1);
00937     Column1.SetMask(wxLIST_MASK_TEXT);
00938     wxListItem Column2;
00939     Column2.SetColumn(2);
00940     Column2.SetMask(wxLIST_MASK_TEXT);
00941 
00942     TempString << wxT("\n[Files]\n");
00943 
00944     for(int i = 0; i < FileView->GetItemCount(); i++)
00945     {
00946         Column1.SetId(i);
00947         FileView->GetItem(Column1);
00948         Column2.SetId(i);
00949         FileView->GetItem(Column2);
00950         if((Column2.GetText().CmpNoCase(wxT("Y")) == 0) && (Column1.GetText().Last() != wxFileName::GetPathSeparator()))
00951             /* TODO (SofT#1#): Does adding the file seperator cause a problem when 
00952                                reading back since on windows this is \ followed by \n 
00953                                which would escape the backslash */
00954             TempString << FileView->GetItemText(i) << wxT("=") << Column1.GetText() << wxString(wxFileName::GetPathSeparator()) << wxT("\n");
00955         else
00956             TempString << FileView->GetItemText(i) << wxT("=") << Column1.GetText() << wxT("\n");
00957     }
00958 
00959     TempString << wxT("\n[Icons]\n");
00960     
00961     for(int i = 0; i < IconView->GetItemCount(); i++)
00962     {
00963         Column1.SetId(i);
00964         IconView->GetItem(Column1);
00965         Column2.SetId(i);
00966         IconView->GetItem(Column2);
00967         if(!Column2.GetText().IsEmpty())
00968             TempString << IconView->GetItemText(i) << wxT("=") << Column1.GetText() << wxT(",") << Column2.GetText() << wxT("\n");
00969         else
00970             TempString << IconView->GetItemText(i) << wxT("=") << Column1.GetText() << wxT("\n");
00971             
00972     }
00973     return TempString;
00974 }
00975 /*
00976  * btnAddItemClick
00977  */
00978 void PackMaker2Frm::btnAddItemClick(wxCommandEvent& event)
00979 {
00980         // insert your code here
00981     MenuForm m(this);
00982     
00983     if(m.ShowModal() == wxID_OK)
00984     {
00985         int Index = IconView->GetItemCount();
00986         IconView->InsertItem(Index,m.edName->GetValue());
00987         IconView->SetItem(Index,1,m.edTarget->GetValue());
00988         IconView->SetItem(Index,2,m.edIcon->GetValue());
00989     }
00990 }
00991 
00992 /*
00993  * btnEditItemClick
00994  */
00995 void PackMaker2Frm::btnEditItemClick(wxCommandEvent& event)
00996 {
00997         // insert your code here
00998     if(IconView->GetSelectedItemCount() <= 0)
00999         return;
01000     MenuForm m(this);
01001     
01002     wxListItem Column1;
01003     Column1.SetColumn(1);
01004     Column1.SetMask(wxLIST_MASK_TEXT);
01005     wxListItem Column2;
01006     Column2.SetColumn(2);
01007     Column2.SetMask(wxLIST_MASK_TEXT);
01008     
01009     int Selected = IconView->GetNextItem(-1,wxLIST_NEXT_ALL,wxLIST_STATE_SELECTED);
01010     m.edName->SetValue(IconView->GetItemText(Selected));
01011     Column1.SetId(Selected);
01012     IconView->GetItem(Column1);
01013     m.edTarget->SetValue(Column1.GetText());
01014     Column2.SetId(Selected);
01015     IconView->GetItem(Column2);
01016     m.edIcon->SetValue(Column2.GetText());
01017     if(m.ShowModal() == wxID_OK)
01018     {
01019         IconView->SetItem(Selected,0,m.edName->GetValue());
01020         IconView->SetItem(Selected,1,m.edTarget->GetValue());
01021         IconView->SetItem(Selected,2,m.edIcon->GetValue());
01022     }
01023 }
01024 
01025 /*
01026  * btnRemoveIconClick
01027  */
01028 void PackMaker2Frm::btnRemoveIconClick(wxCommandEvent& event)
01029 {
01030         // insert your code here
01031     if(IconView->GetSelectedItemCount() <= 0)
01032         return;
01033         
01034     if(IniFile)
01035     {
01036         IniFile->SetPath(ICONS_SECTION);
01037         IniFile->DeleteEntry(IconView->GetItemText(IconView->GetNextItem(-1,wxLIST_NEXT_ALL,wxLIST_STATE_SELECTED)));
01038     }
01039     IconView->DeleteItem(IconView->GetNextItem(-1,wxLIST_NEXT_ALL,wxLIST_STATE_SELECTED));
01040 }
01041 
01042 /*
01043  * btnRemoveClick
01044  */
01045 void PackMaker2Frm::btnRemoveClick(wxCommandEvent& event)
01046 {
01047         // insert your code here
01048     if(FileView->GetSelectedItemCount() <= 0)
01049         return;
01050 
01051     if(IniFile)
01052     {
01053         IniFile->SetPath(FILES_SECTION);
01054         IniFile->DeleteEntry(FileView->GetItemText(FileView->GetNextItem(-1,wxLIST_NEXT_ALL,wxLIST_STATE_SELECTED)));
01055     }
01056     FileView->DeleteItem(FileView->GetNextItem(-1,wxLIST_NEXT_ALL,wxLIST_STATE_SELECTED));
01057 }
01058 
01059 /*
01060  * btnAddDirClick
01061  */
01062 void PackMaker2Frm::btnAddDirClick(wxCommandEvent& event)
01063 {
01064     FileForm f(this);
01065 
01066     f.SetMode(true);
01067     if(f.ShowModal() == wxID_OK)
01068     {
01069         int Index = FileView->GetItemCount();
01070         wxFileName TempFileName(FileName);
01071         wxFileName TempSourceName(f.GetSource());
01072         TempSourceName.MakeRelativeTo(TempFileName.GetPath());
01073         FileView->InsertItem(Index,TempSourceName.GetFullPath());
01074         //FileView->InsertItem(Index,f.edSource->GetValue());
01075         FileView->SetItem(Index,1,f.GetDestination());
01076         FileView->SetItem(Index,2,wxT("Y"));
01077     }
01078 }
01079 
01080 /*
01081  * btnAddFileClick
01082  */
01083 void PackMaker2Frm::btnAddFileClick(wxCommandEvent& event)
01084 {
01085     FileForm f(this);
01086 
01087     f.SetMode(false);
01088     if(f.ShowModal() == wxID_OK)
01089     {
01090         int Index = FileView->GetItemCount();
01091         wxFileName TempFileName(FileName);
01092         wxFileName TempSourceName(f.GetSource());
01093         TempSourceName.MakeRelativeTo(TempFileName.GetPath());
01094         FileView->InsertItem(Index,TempSourceName.GetFullPath());
01095         //FileView->InsertItem(Index,f.edSource->GetValue());
01096         FileView->SetItem(Index,1,f.GetDestination());
01097         FileView->SetItem(Index,2,wxT("N"));
01098     }
01099 }

01119 void PackMaker2Frm::OpenItemClick()
01120 {
01121         OpenDialog->SetWildcard(wxT("Package Description File (*.DevPackage)|*.DevPackage|All Files (*.*)|*.*"));
01122     if(OpenDialog->ShowModal() == wxID_OK)
01123     {
01124         SetFileName(OpenDialog->GetPath());
01125     }
01126 }
01127 
01128 void PackMaker2Frm::SetFileName(wxString fileName)
01129 {
01130     Clear();
01131     FileName = fileName;
01132     if(IniFile)
01133     {
01134         delete IniFile;
01135         IniFile = NULL;
01136     }
01137     IniFile = new wxFileConfig(wxEmptyString, wxEmptyString,FileName,wxEmptyString,wxCONFIG_USE_LOCAL_FILE | wxCONFIG_USE_NO_ESCAPE_CHARACTERS);
01138     ReadDevPackFile();
01139 }
